mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event (eventTitle, eventContent, eventCreateTime, eventImageName, eventImageUrl, userNum, eventTempSave) VALUES (#{eventTitle}, #{eventContent}, #{eventCreateTime}, #{eventImageName}, #{eventImageUrl}, #{userNum}, #{eventTempSave})
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET eventTitle = #{eventTitle}, eventContent = #{eventContent}, eventCreateTime = #{eventCreateTime}, eventImageName = #{eventImageName}, eventImageUrl = #{eventImageUrl}, userNum = #{userNum}, eventTempSave = #{eventTempSave} WHERE eventNum = #{eventNum}
